skillTree.name: Hates Khorne
skillTree.description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.name: Supple & Spry
skillTree.description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Elven Grudge
skillTree.description: "Foolish hypocrites! The arrogant pride of these Elves brings them far closer to Slaanesh than their egos would have them believe."

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% when fighting against Elves
Melee attack: +14 when fighting against Elves

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monstrous Figure
skillTree.description: For such a lithe, sinuous form as N'Kari, simply brimming with unchecked power – where seduction fails, gleeful murder poses no challenge.

effects.description:
Enemy weapon strength: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy weapon strength: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Unsubtle Seduction
skillTree.description: Even those influenced by violent Chaotic rage may succumb to the allure of wild, impure, licentious abandon.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)
Diplomatic relations: +20 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +20 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Soporific Musk
skillTree.description: The enemy are overtaken by a somniferous perfume that induces sleep in spite of the din raging all about them.

target_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
Leadership is higher than 50% of base

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +25% for Keeper of Secrets units
	(Lord's army)

Experience gain: +10% for characters
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.name: Disciples of Excess
skillTree.description: For N'Kari, and other intrepid disciples of Slaanesh, His temptations truly know no bounds...

effects.description:
Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -100%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemies unit mass: -25%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Rapid Ruination
skillTree.description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Lash of Slaanesh"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Acquiescence Upgraded"

Strong vs 25 men unit or above

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pavane of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pavane of Slaanesh Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Phantasmagoria Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Daemonic Inspiration
skillTree.description: Even the Children of Slaanesh can be inspired to ever greater depths of depravity.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Forsaken of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Forsaken of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hellish Stride
skillTree.description: The warriors of Slaanesh waste no time in hunting down their victims, for the heady delight of the kill is as addictive as it is exhilarating.

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +4 for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gratifying Charge
skillTree.description: Atop their powerful beasts of Slaanesh, the Seekers dart across the field of battle, cutting through their foes with devastating precision.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +12% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Chaos Knights of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Chaos Knights of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Chaos Knights of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Chaos Knights of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Princely Chariots
skillTree.description: There's little to do against the advance of a bladed chariot but to be ground beneath its heavy, bloodstained wheels.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Seeker Chariots, Chaos Chariot, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Seeker Chariots, Chaos Chariot, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Seeker Chariots, Chaos Chariot, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Frenzied Revelry
skillTree.description: The minions of the Dark Prince carry out frenzied slaughter in his name. Their victims' abject despair is but a delicious feast for their master.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +12% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Marauder Horsemen and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Marauder Horsemen and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Marauder Horsemen and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Marauder Horsemen and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Such Sights to Show You
skillTree.description: Pleasure and pain sit on either side of a fine-edged blade, and the greatest of Slaanesh's servants delve eagerly into both extremes.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Keeper of Secrets, Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Keeper of Secrets, Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Keeper of Secrets, Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Acolytes of Hedonism
skillTree.description: The endless pursuit of hedonistic delights further corrupts even the most depraved of creatures.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Connoisseurs of Delight
skillTree.description: The true veterans of battle exude an aura of rapturous fulfilment, dulling the senses of their lessers.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Killer's Kiss
skillTree.description: The kiss of a lover, or the kiss of a blade – the decadence's Devotees will have you begging for both!

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Secret Keeper
skillTree.description: There is no end to the power a being holds once it can tug at your wildest fantasies and twist your darkest fears.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Slaves to Excess
skillTree.description: The Perfect Prince can never have too many Devotees. It matters not one jot to Slaanesh whether they come to him willingly or are coerced into His worship.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Drawn to Decadence
skillTree.description: Having given itself willingly to the service of Slaanesh, this force requires neither the carrot nor the stick to fight for Him though either one would no doubt be pleasurable!

skillTree.name: Relentless Advance
skillTree.description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Promise of Perfection
skillTree.description: The Prince of Pleasure whispers in the ears of all, pulling at the threads of their every deviant desire.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Seductive
backgroundSkills.description: "I yearn to taste their delicious agony."

effects.description: Experience gain: +50% each time a new faction is fought in battle

Enemy charge bonus: -25%
	(enemy armies in province)

items.name: Witstealer Sword
items.description: Forged in the molten heat of desire and cooled in a vat of Slaanesh's own blood, the Witstealer Sword was presented to the Arch-tempter by the Dark Prince himself.

factionEffects.title: The Arch-Temptor
factionEffects.description: Very few beings, if any at all, can decline the temptations, offers and secrets granted by N'Kari.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Blessing of Excess" for all units (Rank 7 and above)
Experience gain +1%% for characters and casualties captured post-battle +1%% for every Cultist of Slaanesh
